name: Hunted Gods Demo
detailed_description: You're a 14-year-old orphan on an epic quest to find your little sister who was kidnapped by a giant. To climb to the top of the Interdimensional Tree to find her, you must defeat several titans and assimilate their power, hitting their weak spots with your taut bow. Giants Slayers is a colossal FPS in an open and fascinating world. "I feel inner peace in you," the crazy bird tells you, "and tranquility is the mother of courage".

short_description: In a post apocalyptic fantasy world, all the remaining humans are teenagers, as no one else lives for long. When the new gods are contaminated by the parasite "Eyes of Obsession", they become obsessed with their sacred mission, turning evil.
